title: Sébastien Lecornu - Wikipedia
snippet: Sébastien Lecornu (French: [sebastjɛ̃ ləkɔʁny]; born 11 June 1986) is a French politician who has served as Prime Minister of France since 2025.

title: Sébastien Lecornu, French Minister for the Armed Forces | Ministère des Armées et des Anciens combattants
snippet: Son of a medical secretary and a technician in the aeronautics industry, Sébastien Lecornu studied law at Paris 2 Panthéon-Assas University.

title: Sébastien Lecornu: Age, Net Worth, Relationships, and Career Highlights - Mabumbe
snippet: Sébastien Lecornu, born on June 11, 1986, in Eaubonne, France, is a distinguished French politician renowned for his rapid ascent through the political ranks and his unwavering loyalty to President Emmanuel Macron.

title: Sébastien Lecornu Biography | Pantheon
snippet: Lecornu was President of the Departmental Council of Eure from 2015 to 2017. In government, he served as Secretary of State to the Minister of the Ecological and Inclusive Transition (2017–2018), Minister for Local Authorities (2018–2020) ...
